name: SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Civil Works Specification Section 2, Clause 14.1
ACTIVITY/TASK - Proof Roll Witnessed by Principal's Representative.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to commencing with the AP65 subbase layer.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Acceptance of subgrade by Principal's Representative.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Civil Works Specification Section 2, Clause 14.4.2
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing AP65 subbase layer on site.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Material meets specification. Material acceptance by Principal's Representative.
ACTIVITY/TASK - Clegg Testing - Minimum Clegg Impact Value (CIV) of 25.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing Fibre Concrete under containers. Minimum 2 tests under each container.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Minimum CIV 25 achieved. Acceptance by Principal's Representative.
ACTIVITY/TASK - Clegg Testing - Minimum Clegg Impact Value (CIV) of 25.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing Basecourse layer.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Minimum CIV 25 achieved. Acceptance by Principal's Representative.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Civil Works Specification Section 2 Clause 14.4. TNZ B/02 Clause 7.6
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Minimum 5 No. NDM Tests per area. Compaction to achieve average > 95% MDD with minimum value > 92%.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Compaction achieves average > 95% MDD achieved with minimum value > 92%.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Civil Works Specification Section 2 Clause 14.4. TNZ B/02 Clause 5.1
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - On completion of Subbase layer prior to placing Basecourse layer.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Line and level within tolerances.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - On completion of kerb and channel installation.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Kerb and channel meets specification.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Civil Works Specification Section 2 Clause 14.5.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing AP40 Basecourse layer on site.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Material meets specification. Material acceptance by Principal's Representative.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - NDM Testnig each area. Compaction to achieve average > 95% MDD with minimum value > 92%.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Compaction achieves average > 95% MDD achieved with minimum value > 92%.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Civil Works Specification Section 2 Clause 14.5. TNZ B/02 Clause 7.6.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Minimum 5 No. NDM Tests per area. Compaction to achieve average > 98% MDD with minimum value > 95%.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Compaction achieves average > 98% MDD achieved with minimum value > 95%.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Civil Works Specification Section 2 Clause 14.4. TNZ B/02 Clause 5.1.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - On completion of Basecourse layer prior to placing Basecourse layer.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Line and level within tolerances.
ACTIVITY/TASK - Specification as agreed between Principal and Contractor.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to using the material on site
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Specification as agreed between Principal and Contractor prior to works commencing.
ACTIVITY/TASK - Testing as agreed between Principal and Contractor.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - On completion of AC pavement layer.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Testing as agreed between Principal and Contractor prior to works commencing.
